entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 01:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:42 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:42 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:42 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
